Basic:
import { useState } from 'react'
import { Checkbox, CheckboxControl, CheckboxLabel, type CheckedState } from '@ark-ui/react'

const Basic = () => (
  <Checkbox defaultChecked>
    <CheckboxLabel>Checkbox</CheckboxLabel>
    <CheckboxControl />
  </Checkbox>
)
Indeterminate:
import { useState } from 'react'
import { Checkbox, CheckboxControl, CheckboxLabel, type CheckedState } from '@ark-ui/react'

const Indeterminate = () => (
  <Checkbox checked="indeterminate">
    <CheckboxLabel>Checkbox</CheckboxLabel>
    <CheckboxControl />
  </Checkbox>
)
